title: How to start publishing my write ups - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not sure if you’re asking about puplishing your writings out of the dark to let people support you and go for something bigger Or asking about getting to a puplisher with a book or a novel or whatever to puplish If it is the first I advise you of having a blog or look for groups on FB or Telegram where you can share your writings and get feedback that help you improve If it is you want to publish a book i’m afraid that i don’t have enough experience to answer you .
